title: (x) A Tribute To Our Quiet Heroes - Perpetua, Poppl Exquisit, Isadora {Patricia, Ali}
content:
can anyone help me determine which fonts are used in this logo?

thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [QuietHeroesLogo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060524205235/http:/typophile.com/files/QuietHeroesLogo.jpg) | 595.56 KB |
author: salisae

comments.content:
QUIET HEROES = [Perpetua](http://web.archive.org/web/20060524205235/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/perpetua-2/)

QH (in middle of logo) = [Exquisit Normal](http://web.archive.org/web/20060524205235/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/poppl-exquisit-bq/)

Dunno about the script at the top

that is quite an amazing talent you have, pattyfab!

i have perpetua but not exquisit. what other fonts are close? this is for a charity so i have no budget. the fonts donâ€™t have to be exact. just close.

i do have 3416 font though .. so i must have something similar.

the script at the top is Isadora.

Ali
